name: Five Nights In The Cosmos
description:
You will be spending five nights at the cosmos where you will use your interstellar defense skills to destroy planets and asteroids! You will defend earth and you will defend moon over fight nights from the space asteroids using your space robot mechsuit!
Destroy asteroids and protect the galactic fleet using your ninja like reflexes and don't become a robot!

You are in command of a machine gun turret on the lunar surface who is tasked with defending the moon base from incoming threats.
The harsh environment of space is filled with many dangers such as speeding asteroids, aggressive alien gunships and energetic solar flares.
There are two modes of play for you to choose from, shift-based campaign with increasing difficulty or unlimited survival.
Enjoy the free Five Night's in the Cosmos, will you survive? This ain't no summer job, use your every night wisely!

Defend your moon base from the dangers of space in the free five nights of fun!
